quotes: In March 2023, photos and videos of Ma touring the Yungu school in Hangzhou, China appeared on social media confirming the public appearance of the billionaire for the first time in several months.
The Wall Street Journal reported on 30 March that Ma engineered this in talks with company CEO Daniel Zhang while he was traveling overseas.
Ant Group made major changes to its ownership structure and corporate governance in January 2023.
In early 2024, Ma replaced SoftBank as Alibaba's largest shareholder.
On 17 February 2025, Ma attended a symposium with Chinese industry leaders, hosted by Xi Jinping at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing.
In 2017, Ma made his acting debut with his first kung fu short film Gong Shou Dao, directed by Wen Zhang and produced by Jet Li.
